#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int cindex(int arr[],int l,int r,int key)
{
int m;    
while(r-l>1)
{
m=(r+l)/2;
(arr[m]>key?r:l)=m;
}
//cout<<"r="<<r<<endl;
return r;
}
int lis(int arr[],int n)
{
int table[100001];
memset(table,0,sizeof(table));
int len=1;
int i;
table[0]=arr[0];
for(i=1;i<n;i++)
{
if(arr[i]<table[0])
table[0]=arr[i];
else if(arr[i]>=table[len-1])
{table[len++]=arr[i];
//cout<<"i="<<i<<endl;
//printf("table[%d]=%d\n",len-1,table[len-1]);
}
else
{table[cindex(table,0,len-1,arr[i])]=arr[i];
}
}
//for(i=0;i<len;i++)
//{
//cout<<table[i]<<endl;    
//}
return len;
}
int main()
{
int n;
scanf("%d",&n);
int arr[n];
int i;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
printf("%d",lis(arr,n));
return 0;
}
